data.text:
@protectustwt @DrPanMD Senator Pan make sure to put full liability protection in this bogus law as you have blood in your hand if any injuries and long term health damage in our healthy children!
Drop this bogus law!!

@protectustwt @DrPanMD “Others also expressed concerns about a lack of vaccine data for school-aged kids and potentially unpredictable social impacts that a mandate could cause.”https://t.co/Y8kjO1ccnz
@protectustwt @DrPanMD You limited public comment and cut the phone lines, Dick. Not cool. But, the public was not speaking in your favor and you’re a coward.
@protectustwt @DrPanMD get your claws out of union politics ~ these big pharma crooks have ran our economy into the dirt =[ you are fired

@protectustwt @DrPanMD What about the longterm burden of vax injury? Millions of vax injured struggling to get the care & treatment they need, in large part b/c dr's like @DrPanMD deny that adverse reactions exist. Why don't those lives matter?
@protectustwt @DrPanMD But even after Vax they can get infected....

@protectustwt @DrPanMD My newborn, toddler, 11yo, 13yo all had covid. The youngest we’re sick with cold like symptoms for 2 days. My older kids had flu like symptoms for a few days. They are all fine!!  Leave our children alone.
@berkeley_dad @protectustwt @DrPanMD @BerkeleyUnified @BuffyWicks Vaccinated are at an increased of contracting covid and hospitalization
